onboarding.paragraph_step1: As a client, you can get help with countless tasks from skilled people near you
onboarding.paragraph_step2: Please indicate details such as the need for tools, the amount of people required, etc. to get help faster
onboarding.paragraph_step3: When using our app, you're already tapping into a network of trusted and skilled partners -help us keep it that way! Refrain from exchanging contact information externally
